name: ui5plugin
description: Extension for working with UI5 projects
author: Ilja Postnovs <ilja.postnovs@gmail.com>

ui5.plugin.ui5version.description: SAPUI5 Library version for lib metadata preload

ui5.plugin.signatureHelp.description: Should UI5 Signature Help be enabled

ui5.plugin.xmlDiagnostics.description: Should UI5 XML Diagnostics be enabled

ui5.plugin.jsDiagnostics.description: Should UI5 JS Diagnostics be enabled

ui5.plugin.useWrongFieldMethodLinter.description: JS Linter: Should Wrong Field and Method validator be used

ui5.plugin.useWrongClassNameLinter.description: JS Linter: Should Wrong UI5 Class Name validator be used

ui5.plugin.useWrongImportLinter.description: JS Linter: Should Wrong SAP UI Define Import validator be used

ui5.plugin.useWrongParametersLinter.description: JS Linter: Should Wrong method parameters validator be used

ui5.plugin.moveDefineToFunctionParameter.description: Should sap.ui.define class names be moved to function parameters on sap.ui.define autocomplition

ui5.plugin.libsToLoad.description: List of libs to be loaded

ui5.plugin.addI18nTextLengthLimitation.description: Should text length be added to i18n text id (e.g. #YMSG,14)

ui5.plugin.textTransformationStrategy.description: Case type which should be used for i18n text id proposal

ui5.plugin.askUserToConfirmI18nId.description: Should user confirm proposed i18n id

ui5.plugin.addInheritedPropertiesAndAggr.description: Should inherited properties/aggregations be added in XML completion items

ui5.plugin.ignoreAccessLevelModifiers.description: Should JS completion items ignore access modifiers (private, protected, public). If flag is set to true, all of the completion items for methods and fields will be shown, however, if set to false, completion items will be generated according to access modifiers.

ui5.plugin.rejectUnauthorized.description: Data source related property. If true, the server certificate is verified against the list of supplied CAs. Verification happens at the connection level, before the HTTP request is sent.

commands.title: UI5: Generate UML Class diagram for current document
UI5: Generate UML Class diagram for whole project
